title: Tether to accelerate push into commodity lending with cash, USDt credit
summary: Tether is expanding its commodity-trade lending after deploying $1.5 billion in credit, marking a deeper shift from stablecoin issuer to global finance player.

title: Bitcoin bull run ‘might actually be over’ as Wyckoff pattern points to $86K
summary: The oft-cited Wyckoff pattern suggests that Bitcoin price could be headed toward $86,000 next, especially if BTC fails to hold $94,000, which is the average cost basis of 6 to 12-month Bitcoin holders.

title: Ripple CTO’s ‘50-year Bitcoin’ joke has a point: Here’s the deeper lesson on crypto evolution
summary: The “50-year Bitcoin” joke reveals crypto’s split tempo, where the base layer ossifies while L2s and edge systems innovate rapidly.

title: How Square’s new Bitcoin payments could change how merchants accept money online
summary: Square’s new Bitcoin payments may redefine how merchants accept money online with faster settlement, lower costs and greater financial control.

title: Can Zcash’s rise revive the Bitcoin OP_CAT discussion?
summary: As prominent cryptocurrency figures advocate for privacy protocols like Zcash, could the Bitcoin ecosystem revisit the reactivation of Bitcoin opcode OP_CAT?

title: UK central bank still ‘disproportionately cautious’ about stablecoins
summary: Some crypto industry observers believe that the Bank of England’s new proposed regulations for stablecoins are unnecessarily restrictive.

title: Uniswap revives ICO-style token launches with new onchain auction system
summary: Uniswap launched Continuous Clearing Auctions, a new onchain token sale mechanism designed to offer transparent price discovery, debuting with Aztec’s sale.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
summary: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Alibaba weighs deposit token as China clamps down on stablecoins: Report
summary: Alibaba’s global e-commerce arm is reportedly developing a bank-backed deposit token for cross-border payments as Beijing tightens its crackdown on stablecoins.

title: XRP ETF debut outshines all 2025 launches with $250M inflows, record volume
summary: Canary Capital’s XRP ETF outperformed all 900 ETF launches of 2025, inspiring a bullish rotation among the industry’s most successful traders, who are now betting on XRP’s price increasing.
